Definition: In this task, you will be given a sentence in English and your task is to translate it into Spanish. During the translation, you will keep the numbers and capital letters (capitalize only the first word of each sentence and name).

Positive Examples.input: I declare resumed the session of the European Parliament adjourned on Friday 17 December 1999, and I would like once again to wish you a happy new year in the hope that you enjoyed a pleasant festive period.
Positive Examples.output: Declaro reanudado el período de sesiones del Parlamento Europeo, interrumpido el viernes 17 de diciembre pasado, y reitero a Sus Señorías mi deseo de que hayan tenido unas buenas vacaciones.
Positive Examples.explanation: This English sentence is properly translated into Spanish because the Spanish sentence also talks about resuming the session from the European parliament which was adjourned and wishing a happy new year.

Positive Examples.input: Although, as you will have seen, the dreaded 'millennium bug' failed to materialise, still the people in a number of countries suffered a series of natural disasters that truly were dreadful.
Positive Examples.output: Como todos han podido comprobar, el gran "efecto del año 2000" no se ha producido. En cambio, los ciudadanos de varios de nuestros países han sido víctimas de catástrofes naturales verdaderamente terribles.
Positive Examples.explanation: This English sentence is properly translated into Spanish because the Spanish sentence also talks about the dreadful natural disaster suffered across many countries.

Positive Examples.input: In the meantime, I should like to observe a minute' s silence, as a number of Members have requested, on behalf of all the victims concerned, particularly those of the terrible storms, in the various countries of the European Union.
Positive Examples.output: A la espera de que se produzca, de acuerdo con muchos colegas que me lo han pedido, pido que hagamos un minuto de silencio en memoria de todas las víctimas de las tormentas, en los distintos países de la Unión Europea afectados.
Positive Examples.explanation: This English sentence is properly translated into Spanish because the Spanish sentence also talks about the victims of the storms and requests for silence from the members.

Negative Examples.input: Madam President, on a point of order.

Negative Examples.output: En lo relativo al lunes y al martes, no hay modificaciones.
Negative Examples.explanation: The conversion of English to Spanish is wrong because output did not translate " We do not know what is happening. " and instead of that it puts some other words (which do not mean 'We do not know what is happening.').'

Negative Examples.input: I would like your advice about Rule 143 concerning inadmissibility.
Negative Examples.output: Me gustaría que me asesorara sobre el Artículo 145 concerniente a la inadmisibilidad.
Negative Examples.explanation: The conversion of English to Spanish is wrong because it changes the number 143 to 145.
